list_of_reviews.review_title: I have same problem as everyone
list_of_reviews.review: I have same problem as everyone, they stopped withdrawals for me because I deposited and immediately withdrawed funds. It’s not a very big sum, 500 dollars, but still, they asked me to provide huge pack of documents, screenshots, etc. So I did, 6 weeks passed since then. The support stopped responding to my emails a month ago. Looks like think goes bad for them, if they scam people in so dumb way. I’m glad that I didn’t make a larger deposit. Do not trust them, all good reviews are written by their marketing team. I wish I had read the reviews, before I used that scam exchange.

They blocked me for withdrawals and requested documents that I provided 2 days after they accused me of being a US person which I am not but I currently study in the USA. They are trying to steal so badly. I have provided my citizenship which is not the USA. I will keep updating.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I have had several issues as an amateur…
list_of_reviews.review: I have had several issues as an amateur not knowing my way around yet, and every time I opened Support chat someone came INSTANTLY to help out and was very friendly, patient and very professional. Knew immediately what was going on and what I had to do! Awesome Customer Support! Definitely one of the very best I've ever needed! Congratulations!  Roberto C.

i wait now 3 month to withdrawl my money... verification team dont answer since 2 week Although all sorts of available documents are available and more is constantly being demanded... It was an absolute impudence, in the past there were no problems at all... I am supposed to provide evidence from 2013-2015, which is impossible. I have a basic+ verification and should supposedly be able to pay out, but after about 20x trys I gave up. I hope there will be a class action lawsuit at some point. I don't believe I'll get my money back anymore. It's an impudence like I've never experienced on a crypto exchange. SCAM ALERT!!!!!!!

Got this basic scam message straight from their own verified support email. Beware of this company. "Please note that ETP was delisted and withdrawals closed, our only available option is to recover the tokens.As stated here, if you have not withdrawn the funds before the date and time specified, Bitfinex team can attempt to recover your funds.A fee of $500 on full or partial recovered funds will be applied. The fee will be deducted from your Exchange wallet after which, the recovery process will begin. If you would like us to proceed with the recovery, please make sure you have enough funds available for fee deduction."

I contacted two other helpers and it took me an hour and half but I didn't get answer. However Jonas answered me and found right solution. Others didn't find why red dot under AMOUNT XRP of order form in Trading tab. Jonas is the best!

Just great to have their support in complicated market conditions so we are trading successfully throughout! Various teams worked quickly and efficiently throughout while explaining plainly. If you are a trader you are able to concentrate on your trades knowing that processes needing to happen do so without you having to worry about them.

Registered fast, good app and security measures, until tried to Verify.Several attempts and nothing: passport and selfies never good enough. Worrying fact, that all images which are not good, still kept by Bitfinex on your account.Deactivated account after a few month, as wasted enough time with no results.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Don't waste your time and money
list_of_reviews.review: Don't waste your time and money, among all other platforms I have used so far Bitfinex is the worst, with very high deposit, withdrawal and trading fee. I transfered $MATIC coin from Binance and never received it, contacted support teams and it has been under review for ages. It seems never resolving. If you still join Bitfinex trust me it is going to be worst one you will come across. I should have checked the reviews before dealing with Bitfinex

They suddenly delist cryptos and don't even give people a chance to trade them to something they can take out of their Bitfinex wallet. Customer service is not very helpful either. I'd say stay away, there's already enough risk associated with Cryptocurrecy, you wouldn't want added risk because of Bitfinex. The user interface is also far inferior to their counterparts such as Coinbase and Ndax.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Promptly providing the proof of balance
list_of_reviews.review: Thank you very much for promptly providing the proof of balance. I also appreciate your helpful tips on using the Bitfinex reporting application. I find Bitfinex's services to be very thoughtful, and it instills a great deal of trust. Thank you.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I can see that i am not the only one…
list_of_reviews.review: I can see that i am not the only one having issue getting back an account. Also i don't where did they find the support but never, never experienced such a disrespectful "support" saying that i am a liar. Few years ago i helped to creat an account to mother. No issue paying them money but few months ago after she wanted to learn something for her old days its just impossible because she coudnlt send her selfie with handwrited justification with a high resolution(but clear and visible) also i had to translator everything because she's older French lady and don't speek english. This is just crazy, they pretend to be a great exchange blablabla but the support is simply rude, the rules just changed not even giving a chance to adapt. Really can't recommend. Just stick to your ledger guya

Reading the recent reviews makes me wonder who's paying people to shill on Bitfinex. They are spreading lies, and while Bitfinex has it's own share of problems, none of them are the ones that these goofies are refering. If you're going to leave a negative review, atleast make it look plausibly credible.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I see a potential in this exchange, but slow verification process
list_of_reviews.review: I see a potential in this exchange, and very good reviews in other websites, so I did the signup process and started the verification stage (uploaded all documentation) but has been 8 weeks, two months and no notice at all.It could be faster, I think.EDIT: soon after this post, the good people at Bitfinex checked the case and did the proper steps to get the account verified quickly. Thanks.

list_of_reviews.review_title: After 6 years of service they hold my funds
list_of_reviews.review: After 6 years of service (I have used the exchange occasionally) they hold my funds for 3 weeks. I have provided All information I could. The verification Team does not reply for one week. If they allow me to withdraw, I will update this reviews

Amazing experience with Bitfinex's Customer Service. Last year I got my account hacked, I emailed Bitfinex on a Saturday evening, they blocked my account and suspended all pending trades within 3 minutes (this way, the hacker couldn't withdraw all my coins). Today I emailed them about an issue with my 2FA, they replied in 2 minutes. They are doing a great job, I really feel taken care of!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Total nightmare trading on Bitfinex for…
list_of_reviews.review: Total nightmare trading on Bitfinex for 1.5 years. It's a fishy exchange with heavily manipulated prices and withdrawal was impossible. And more and more traders felt Bitfinex actually trade against you. It means you will lose money for sure. Stay away! Try any other exchanges but Bitfinex

list_of_reviews.review_title: Bitfinex is now the best exchange I've…
list_of_reviews.review: Bitfinex is now the best exchange I've ever used with all their new updates since last year there is no change of getting hacked at all, they have been providing their users with the best assets to trade at the lowest fees.. Their support is now outstanding you have a problem it's fixed in a few hours honestly I'm amazed at how good this exchange has become!

My LN-BTC withdrawal failed, and had a confusing error message. I emailed the support, and they VERY quickly responded and informed me why it was happening, and what was going to happen next. Pretty shortly thereafter, the amount was returned to my wallet. Great customer service! Most importantly, they were fast and helpful.I was able to complete withdrawal after a couple more failed attempts (all my fault being a lightning newb), and each time they patiently returned the money to me.

Thieves! After you set up your account they allow you to deposit and trade, but when you try to withdraw they block you and hold your funds claiming that you have not completed account verification, but my profile states my account verification all sections are completed.When you send emails to support they do not reply. The result they hold your funds.
